definitions.definition: Stopping and starting , occurring , or presenting at intervals ; coming after a particular time span .
examples: The day was cloudy with intermittent rain.
Intermittent bugs are most difficult to reproduce.

definitions.definition: Existing only for certain seasons; that is, being dry for part of the year.
examples: The area has many intermittent lakes and streams.
definitions.label_groups: specifically , geology , of a body of water

main_definition: Stopping and starting , occurring , or presenting at intervals ; coming after a particular time span .
secondary_definitions: ( specifically , geology , of a body of water ) Existing only for certain seasons; that is, being dry for part of the year.
